name: df-wina
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cwina, cab(s0, w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, cv(s2)))))))
comment: An ordinal is weakly inaccessible iff it is a regular limit cardinal. Note that our definition allows ` _om ` as a weakly inaccessible cardinal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2013.)
